ability_afterburn.Description: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. 's bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.
ability_afterburn.Name: Afterburn

ability_astro_rifle.Description: Equip a Rifle that deals spirit damage to hit Heroes and gives  a stacking damage bonus against them.
ability_astro_rifle.Name: Marksman

ability_astro_shotgun_toggle.Description:
Use to toggle between your pistol and shotgun. The shotgun so powerful it forces to move the opposite direction of the shot while airborn. [] shoots forward and [] shoots behind you with a slight delay. The shotgun uses special bullets that does not benefit from ammo mods.

Lassoed units do not take damage when shooting backwards.
ability_astro_shotgun_toggle.Name: Force of Nature

ability_blood_bomb.Description:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
ability_blood_bomb.Name: Essence Bomb

ability_blood_shards.Description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
ability_blood_shards.Name: Malice

ability_bounce_pad.Description: Drop a bounce pad in the world that sends you and other heroes flying. You will stomp down on landing, dealing damage to any nearby enemies.
ability_bounce_pad.Name: Bounce Pad

ability_burrow.Description: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.
ability_burrow.Name: Burrow

ability_charged_shot.Description: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [] or [] to hold the shot.
ability_charged_shot.Name: Charged Shot

ability_death_tax.Description: Enemies injured by Lady Geist are marked with Death Tax. Whenever a marked enemy dies,  gains health.
ability_death_tax.Name: Death Tax

ability_explosive_barrel.Description: Place a barrel that explodes when shot, or on landing after launched via melee attack or bounce pad. Has a minimum arm time before it can explode.
ability_explosive_barrel.Name: Powder Keg

ability_flame_dash.Description:
Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains 30% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold [] to dash faster.
ability_flame_dash.Name: Flame Dash

ability_hat_trick.Description: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
ability_hat_trick.Name: Hat Trick

ability_ice_grenade.Description: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.
ability_ice_grenade.Name: Frost Grenade

ability_icebeam.Description: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced movement speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
ability_icebeam.Name: Arctic Beam

ability_icepath.Description:
creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press [] / [] to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
ability_icepath.Name: Ice Path

ability_immobilize_trap.Description: Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, immobilizing and then slowing them.
ability_immobilize_trap.Name: Immobilizing Trap

ability_incendiary_projectile.Description: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage  does to them.
ability_incendiary_projectile.Name: Catalyst

ability_intimidate.Description: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
ability_intimidate.Name: Scorn

ability_kali_dust_storm.Description: Send out a tornado that damages enemies it touches, as well as applying a lingering movement and fire rate slow.
ability_kali_dust_storm.Name: Dust Storm

ability_lash_flog.Description: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.
ability_lash_flog.Name: Flog

ability_life_drain.Description: Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your movement speed is reduced by half. Press [] to cancel.
ability_life_drain.Name: Life Drain

ability_nano_pounce.Description: Leap at a target.  Targetting an enemy will cause damage and slow on nearby enemies.  Targeting an ally will have reduced Cooldown and Recharge times.
ability_nano_pounce.Name: Siamese Strike

ability_nano_proximity_ritual.Description: Spawn a Statue that life steals from a nearby enemy giving health to itself and .  Statues are activate only when  is near by.
ability_nano_proximity_ritual.Name: Deadly Decor

ability_nano_warp.Description: Teleport to target and deal area damage causing slow on nearby enemies.
ability_nano_warp.Name: Siamese Strike

ability_perched_predator.Description:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press [] to manually create the explosion.
ability_perched_predator.Name: Perched Predator

ability_power_jump.Description: Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon. Press [] to cancel the glide.
ability_power_jump.Name: Rain of Arrows

ability_power_surge.Description: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
ability_power_surge.Name: Power Surge

ability_scrap_blast.Description: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
ability_scrap_blast.Name: Bio Blast

ability_sleep_dagger.Description: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
ability_sleep_dagger.Name: Sleep Dagger

ability_smoke_bomb.Description: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
ability_smoke_bomb.Name: Smoke Bomb

ability_stacking_damage.Description: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
ability_stacking_damage.Name: Fixation

ability_target_practice.Description: On activate, your next gun hit selects an enemy Hero as a target.  Shoot them 4 times to deal a burst of spirit damage.  Every Headshot will increase the burst
ability_target_practice.Name: Target Practice

ability_throw_sand.Description: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
ability_throw_sand.Name: Sand Blast

ability_warden_crowd_control.Description: Throw a flask that damages, slows, and reduces the weapon damage and stamina of enemies it hits.
ability_warden_crowd_control.Name: Alchemical Flask

ability_warden_high_alert.Description: Gain a spirit shield and bonus movement speed.
ability_warden_high_alert.Name: Willpower

ability_warden_lock_down.Description: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
ability_warden_lock_down.Name: Binding Word

ability_wrecker_salvage.Description: Stuns an enemy trooper or NPC, damaging them while held. A successful kill provides a fire rate bonus, and restores a Bio Blast charge.  This bonus stacks independently
ability_wrecker_salvage.Name: Consume

ability_wrecking_ball.Description: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning anything it hits. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
ability_wrecking_ball.Name: Wrecking Ball

cadence_ability_anthem.Description: Burst into an inspiring song! You and any ally that comes within range get an instant reload with an extra large clip, and have a Fire Rate bonus that increases until the song ends.
cadence_ability_anthem.Name: Anthem

cadence_ability_lullaby.Description: Lull your foes to sleep! Any enemy that comes in range of Cadence sleeps until woken by damage, Cadence goes out of range, or the song ends. Cadence has bonus regeneration while singing.
cadence_ability_lullaby.Name: Lullaby

cadence_ability_silencecontraptions.Description: Disarm yourself perform a long-range dash melee attack. For the duration of the song, you remain disarmed and your melee abilities apply a debuff that disarms and EMP's enemy targets.
cadence_ability_silencecontraptions.Name: Silence Contraptions

citadel_ability_bull_charge.Description: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along.  Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by . Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
citadel_ability_bull_charge.Name: Shoulder Charge

citadel_ability_bull_heal.Description: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.
citadel_ability_bull_heal.Name: Siphon Life

citadel_ability_card_toss.Description: Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
citadel_ability_card_toss.Name: Card Trick

citadel_ability_charged_tackle.Description: Build up power then enter a charge, dragging and damaging enemies in your path. Can be canceled early.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle.Name: Charged Tackle

citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine.Description:
Start charging your weapon and gain increased movement speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing [] while an empowered shot is available.
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine.Name: Kinetic Carbine

citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade.Description: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for  against the victim.
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade.Name: Pulse Grenade

citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall.Description: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it.  Enemies that touch the wall will take damage as a percentage of their max health and be briefly slowed.
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall.Name: Time Wall

citadel_ability_fissure_wall.Description:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press [] or [] to erupt the wall early.
citadel_ability_fissure_wall.Name: Spectral Wall

citadel_ability_flying_strike.Description: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
citadel_ability_flying_strike.Name: Flying Strike

citadel_ability_healing_slash.Description: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
citadel_ability_healing_slash.Name: Crimson Slash

citadel_ability_hook.Description:
Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first enemy hero it hits, dealing damage. Target will be placed where you are facing.
Cast using [] to target friendly heroes.
citadel_ability_hook.Name: Hook

citadel_ability_hornet_chain.Description: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
citadel_ability_hornet_chain.Name: Stake

citadel_ability_hornet_leap.Description: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
citadel_ability_hornet_leap.Name: Flight

citadel_ability_hornet_mark.Description: Vindicta mark's an enemy. They are visible on the minimap for the duration, and Vindicta can detect them through walls.
citadel_ability_hornet_mark.Name: Vindicta's Mark

citadel_ability_hornet_sting.Description: Your crow familiar deals impact damage and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
citadel_ability_hornet_sting.Name: Crow Familiar

citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge.Description: Provides a large speed bonus to you and nearby allies. The speed bonus decays over time.
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge.Name: Pack Hunter

citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade.Description: Throw a spinning blade that deals damage and returns to you.
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade.Name: Occilioblade

citadel_ability_lash.Description: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
citadel_ability_lash.Name: Grapple

citadel_ability_lash_down_strike.Description: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike.Name: Ground Strike

citadel_ability_lightning_ball.Description: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
citadel_ability_lightning_ball.Name: Lightning Ball

citadel_ability_mobile_resupply.Description: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.
citadel_ability_mobile_resupply.Name: Medicinal Specter

citadel_ability_nikuman.Description: While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby.
citadel_ability_nikuman.Name: Rejuvenating Aurora

citadel_ability_passive_beefy.Description: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.
citadel_ability_passive_beefy.Name: Infernal Resilience

citadel_ability_poison_bullets.Description: Apply tranquilizer to your victim until they fall asleep. Sleeping victims cannot act and take damage when they wake up.
citadel_ability_poison_bullets.Name: Tranquilizer Bullets

citadel_ability_power_slash.Description:
Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press [] or [] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
citadel_ability_power_slash.Name: Power Slash

citadel_ability_psychic_daggers.Description: Telekinetically throw cards that hit random targets around you.
citadel_ability_psychic_daggers.Name: Royal Flush

citadel_ability_psychic_pulse.Description: Sense enemies in front of you, revealing their position through walls to your team.  Card Trick can target enemies seen through walls
citadel_ability_psychic_pulse.Name: Psychic Pulse

citadel_ability_running_decoy.Description: creates a temporary decoy that will run towards the target location and shoot at any nearby enemies.
citadel_ability_running_decoy.Name: Decoy

citadel_ability_shieldedsentry.Description:
Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime.
Turrets gain 30% of 's max health and have 60% Spirit Resist. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.
citadel_ability_shieldedsentry.Name: Mini Turret

citadel_ability_shiv_dagger.Description: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy.  Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
citadel_ability_shiv_dagger.Name: Serrated Knives

citadel_ability_shiv_dash.Description:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
citadel_ability_shiv_dash.Name: Slice and Dice

citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage.Description: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time.  Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage.Name: Bloodletting

citadel_ability_static_charge.Description: Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
citadel_ability_static_charge.Name: Static Charge

citadel_ability_sticky_bomb.Description:
Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.
Gain +2.5% bomb damage for every enemy hero hit.
citadel_ability_sticky_bomb.Name: Sticky Bomb

citadel_ability_stomp.Description: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.
citadel_ability_stomp.Name: Kinetic Pulse

citadel_ability_tangotether.Description: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them.  Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [] to Lock on to a target
citadel_ability_tangotether.Name: Watcher's Covenant

citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form.Description: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.
citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form.Name: Stone Form

citadel_ability_tengu_urn.Description: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.
citadel_ability_tengu_urn.Name: Kudzu Bomb

citadel_ability_uppercut.Description: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage where they land. Does not damage allies.
citadel_ability_uppercut.Name: Exploding Uppercut

citadel_ability_void_sphere.Description: briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max 8s). Can be cast with [] to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
citadel_ability_void_sphere.Name: Quantum Entanglement

citadel_ability_wing_blast.Description: Create a blast of air that pushes enemies away and damages them.
citadel_ability_wing_blast.Name: Wing Blast

citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire.Description: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire.Name: Full Auto

gunslinger_rapid_fire.Description: Rapidly fire your guns at a target with perfect accuracy and 50% increased damage for 1.5s.  Causes  and the target to float if in the air.
gunslinger_rapid_fire.Name: Rapid Fire

gunslinger_rocket_launcher.Description: Equip a rocket launcher that fires explosive rockets.  Rocket blasts can launch enemies and  into the air.
gunslinger_rocket_launcher.Name: Rocket Launcher

gunslinger_tenacity.Description: Gain 15% bullet life steal, increased by up to 100% based on 's missing health.
gunslinger_tenacity.Name: Tenacity

mirage_fire_beetles.Description: Start launching fire beetles. Each beetle can be launched separately, applying a lifesteal over time to enemies they hit. Once the launch window ends, this ability goes on cooldown.
mirage_fire_beetles.Name: Fire Beetles

mirage_sand_phantom.Description: Become enveloped in a whirlwind, gaining bullet evasion and bonus movement speed.
mirage_sand_phantom.Name: Whirling Dervish

mirage_tornado.Description: Send out a tornado that damages enemies and lifts them up in the air.
mirage_tornado.Name: Tornado

rutger_cheat_death.Description: When taking otherwise fatal damage, Rutger becomes unkillable for 4s.
rutger_cheat_death.Name: Cheat Death

rutger_force_field.Description: Create a field at target location that pushes enemies away from its outer edge.
rutger_force_field.Name: Force Field

rutger_rocket.Description:
Launch a rocket that deals damage in an area and applies knockback.
Rutger receives 50% damage and 175% knockback from his own rocket if he's in its impact radius.
rutger_rocket.Name: Rocket Launcher

slork_chomp.Description: Dash forward and grab onto an enemy, biting them repeatedly. The enemy is slowed, disarmed, and silenced while grappled. When the target is below half health, deal an additional 4% of their max health in damage.
slork_chomp.Name: Chomp

slork_last_breath.Description: Encase yourself in a sphere of water that can absorb up to 120 damage before bursting. When the sphere disipates for any reason enemies in range take 80 damage.
slork_last_breath.Name: Deep's Embrace

slork_riptide.Description: Summon a churning vortex of superheated water that burns enemies and lauches them towards Slork.
slork_riptide.Name: Riptide

slork_scald.Description: Spray out an arc of superheated water that damages enemies over time.
slork_scald.Name: Scald

synth_barrage.Description:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
synth_barrage.Name: Barrage

synth_blitz.Description: Gain fast firing rate and bullet lifesteal for a brief flurry of shots.
synth_blitz.Name: Blitz

synth_grasp.Description: Tether all nearby enemy heroes to you and gain Bullet Shield for each enemy hero tethered. You're immobilized for the duration.
synth_grasp.Name: Grasp

synth_plasma_flux.Description: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [] to teleport to its location.
synth_plasma_flux.Name: Flying Cloak

synth_pulse.Description: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
synth_pulse.Name: Enchanter's Satchel

thumper_ability_1.Description: Thumper focuses a high power acoustic wave to reflect off of a hard surface. Blasting shards of material off in the reflected wave.
thumper_ability_1.Name: Shatter Cannon

thumper_ability_2.Description: Rolls out a spike strip that damage enemies more the further they move through it.
thumper_ability_2.Name: Spike Strip

thumper_ability_3.Description: Sends out a badger drone to harry an enemy and reveal it's position.
thumper_ability_3.Name: Badger Drone

tokamak_breach.Description: Explosively decompress a cloud of coolant. Allies inside the cloud are invisible.
tokamak_breach.Name: Breach

tokamak_dying_star.Description: Launch forward damaging all enemies near where you land, knocking them into the air.
tokamak_dying_star.Name: Dying Star

tokamak_hot_shot.Description: Blast your enemies with a jet of superheated plasma. Deals additional damage when the heat guage is in the red. Triples heat dissipation while active.
tokamak_hot_shot.Name: Hot Shot

tokamak_radiance.Description: Bring your core to the brink of criticality, blinding and damaging any that look in your direction. Damage increases when enemies look directly at you.
tokamak_radiance.Name: Blinding Radiance

viscous_goo_grenade.Description: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
viscous_goo_grenade.Name: Splatter

viscous_restorative_goo.Description: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that purges debuffs, protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [] to escape early.
viscous_restorative_goo.Name: The Cube

viscous_telepunch.Description: Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.
viscous_telepunch.Name: Puddle Punch

yakuza_kobun.Description: Summons a subordinate gangster to follow a friendly unit and attack enemies closest to that target.  Double tap to self cast.
yakuza_kobun.Name: Hired Muscle

yakuza_protection_racket.Description: Create a protective force shield to protect an ally and increase their crit damage. Purges negative effects on the target when cast.
yakuza_protection_racket.Name: Protection Racket

yakuza_shakedown_target.Description: Send a drone to lock an area down, rooting and damaging enemies in the area. The link between your drones shares a portion of the damage you take with a random rooted enemy.
yakuza_shakedown_target.Name: Shakedown
